definitions.definition: A means of overcoming some obstacle , especially an obstacle consisting of constraints , or laws or regulations .
A procedure or a temporary fix that bypasses a problem and allows a user to continue working until a better solution can be provided .
An impromptu and temporary response to an unforeseen problem or risk .

main_definition: A means of overcoming some obstacle , especially an obstacle consisting of constraints , or laws or regulations .
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) A procedure or a temporary fix that bypasses a problem and allows a user to continue working until a better solution can be provided .
( project management ) An impromptu and temporary response to an unforeseen problem or risk .
